mapper.insert: insert into sys_horse_race_lamp(tid, content, interval_title, state, horse_race_grade, begin_time, end_time, play_begin_time, play_end_time, create_time, update_time, create_by, update_by) values (#{tid}, #{content}, #{intervalTitle}, #{state}, #{horseRaceGrade}, #{beginTime}, #{endTime}, #{playBeginTime}, #{playEndTime}, sysdate(), sysdate(), #{createBy}, #{createBy})
mapper.select: SELECT tid platform,id,interval_title*60 `interval`,content info ,begin_time play_start_time,end_time play_end_time, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW()) mtime FROM sys_horse_race_lamp WHERE state = '2' OR (state = '1' AND SYSDATE()>=begin_time)
